sub_title: Freelance Communication Professional I Translator Dutch, German, English
summary:
In 2017 I took the leap... As a freelancer I now combine my years of experience in (marketing) communication with my passion for languages and traveling. My mission: providing communication and translation services that connect people across borders - with a special focus on Dutch-German/Austrian relations.

As an enthusiastic and experienced communication professional and translator, I balance a helicopter view with an eye for detail, and am committed to deliver quality results. I enjoy working on projects and making things happen, together with like-minded professionals. People value me for my ability to bring together multiple interests and perspectives, my professionalism, expertise and personal engagement.

Specialties:
•	Cross-border communication
•	Communication & content strategies
•	SEO copywriting
•	Translation services: Dutch (native), German and English
•	Project and event management

International communication challenge? Let’s get in touch!
E juliet@juul-communicatie.nl
T +31 (0)6 14816028
www.juul-communicatie.nl (Dutch and German at present)
